The Learning Corner

Improve blogging

March 22, 2025

As I'm writing posts in this blog I have some ideas for improving the workflow. For one, I am currently unable to quickly link to other posts within the blog. This should be easy to resolve. In my private notes I use vim-zettel, which allows me to use a shortcut to search through other notes in my directory and link to them.

Another feature that would be very useful is to be able to search for web links right from the editor. For example if I am referencing an episode of the Huberman Lab podcast, it would be extremely nice to have a shortcut like for the local notes, which pulls data from a search engine. If I could get that experience to be similar to using fzf inside the editor, this would be super exciting.
